120 class stSlimLogicNode{
121  public:

134  ~stSlimLogicNode();
135 
145  int AddEntry(ObjectType * obj){
146  Entries[Count].Object = obj;
147  Entries[Count].Mine = true;
148  Count++;
149  return Count - 1;
150  }//end AddEntry
151 
161  int AddEntry(stSize size, const stByte * object);
162 
166  stCount GetNumberOfEntries(){
167  return Count;
168  }//end GetNumberOfEntries
169 
175  ObjectType * GetObject(int idx){
176  return Entries[idx].Object;
177  }//end GetObject
178 
184  ObjectType * operator [](int idx){
185  return Entries[idx].Object;
186  }//end operator []
187 
193  stPageID GetPageID(int idx){
194  return Entries[idx].PageID;
195  }//end GetPageID
196 
202  stSize GetNEntries(int idx){
203  return Entries[idx].NEntries;
204  }//end GetNEntries
205

212  return Entries[idx].Radius;
213  }//end GetRadius
214

224  Entries[idx].PageID = pageID;

226  Entries[idx].Radius = radius;

270  void SetRepresentative(stCount rep0, stCount rep1){

274 
287  stCount Distribute(stSlimIndexNode * node0, ObjectType * & rep0,
288  stSlimIndexNode * node1, ObjectType * & rep1,
289  EvaluatorType * metricEvaluator){
290  stCount result;
291 
292  // Distribute...
293  result = TestDistribution(node0, node1, metricEvaluator);
294 
295  // Representatives
296  rep0 = BuyObject(GetRepresentativeIndex(0));
297  rep1 = BuyObject(GetRepresentativeIndex(1));
298 
299  return result;
300  }//end Distribute
301 
314  stCount Distribute(stSlimLeafNode * node0, ObjectType * & rep0,
315  stSlimLeafNode * node1, ObjectType * & rep1,
316  EvaluatorType * metricEvaluator){
317  stCount result;
318 
319  // Distribute...
320  result = TestDistribution(node0, node1, metricEvaluator);
321 
322  // Representatives
323  rep0 = BuyObject(GetRepresentativeIndex(0));
324  rep1 = BuyObject(GetRepresentativeIndex(1));
325 
326  return result;
327  }//end Distribute
328 
341  stCount TestDistribution(stSlimIndexNode * node0, stSlimIndexNode * node1,
342  EvaluatorType * metricEvaluator);
343 
354  stCount TestDistribution(stSlimLeafNode * node0, stSlimLeafNode * node1,
355  EvaluatorType * metricEvaluator);
356 
361  void SetMinOccupation(stCount min){
362  MinOccupation = min;
363  // At least the nodes must store 2 objects.
364  if ((MinOccupation > (MaxEntries/2)) || (MinOccupation == 0)){
365  MinOccupation = 2;
366  }//end if
367  }//end SetMinOccupation
368 
373  stNodeType GetNodeType(){
374  return NodeType;
375  }//end GetNodeType
376 
380  void SetNodeType(stNodeType type){
381  NodeType = type;
382  }//end SetNodeType
383 
390  bool IsRepresentative(stCount idx){
391  return ((idx == RepIndex[0]) || (idx == RepIndex[1]));
392  }//end IsRepresentative
393 
405  ObjectType * BuyObject(stCount idx){
406  Entries[idx].Mine = false;
407  return Entries[idx].Object;
408  }//end BuyObject
409
